headlines.description: Watford's Craig Dawson grabbed a stoppage-time equaliser with an overhead kick to earn his side a 1-1 draw with Leicester City.

video.headline: Leicester at 'the start of a slippery slope' after draw at Watford

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL Analysis (Leicester at 'the start of a slippery slope' after draw at Watford) 2020/6/20 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Dawson's overhead kick earns Watford a draw

headlines.description: Relegation-threatened Brighton beat Arsenal 2-1 on Saturday following a 95th-minute goal from Neal Maupay.

tracking.trackingName: INET_ SOC EPL Interview (Maupay Arsenal need to learn humility) 2020/06/21 UK ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton stun Arsenal with stoppage-time winner

events.name: Wolverhampton Wanderers at West Ham United

headlines.description: Adama Traore came off the bench to inspire Wolverhampton Wanderers to a 2-0 win at West Ham United on Saturday -- a significant result at both ends
headlines.shortLinkText: Jimenez sets Mexican goals mark in Wolves win

headlines.description: First-half goals by Luka Milivojevic and Jordan Ayew put Crystal Palace on the way to a 2-0 victory at Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace cruise to victory in landmark match for BBC
